name: OGDPS Level Thumbnails

issues.info: Please report issues to the GitHub repository.

description: Adds thumbnails to levels in search.

thumbnailButton.name: Enable Thumbnail Button
thumbnailButton.description: Adds a button on the level page that lets you view the thumbnail of the level you are currently on.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of thumbnails that are cached in memory.
